text: Cleoparida is a genus of leaf beetles in the subfamily Eumolpinae. It is distributed in the Solomon Islands. ==Species== * Cleoparida freycinetiae Gressitt, 1967 * Cleoparida obrieni Gressitt, 1967 * Cleoparida ribbei (Jacoby, 1898) * Cleoparida salomonensis (Bryant, 1937) * Cleoparida speciosa Gressitt, 1967 ==References== Category:Eumolpinae Category:Chrysomelidae genera Category:Beetles of Oceania Category:Insects of the Solomon Islands
title: Cleoparida
